UNIT 2

Myself

Time for Reflection

  • When you were a kid, did you have a favorite toy?
  • Do you still have it?
  • Do you have it in your bedroom?
  • Get with a pair and share your ideas.

Let's watch the trailer of an animated movie!

  • What is the story about?
    • a. The story is about a child.
    • b. The story is about a city.
    • c. The story is about the toys.
  • Who are the main characters?
    • a. Dogs.
    • b. Toys.
    • c. Children.
